/*
 * IOPC13D.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 27-Feb-2014
 *      Author: r3gz3n
 */
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

inline long fastio()
{
long t=0;
char ch;
ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')
ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch<='9'&& ch>='0')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+ch-'0';
ch=getchar_unlocked();
}
return t;
}


int main()
{
	long t, n;
	for(t=fastio();t;--t)
	{
		n = fastio();
		if(n % 3 == 0 or n % 2 == 0)
			printf("YES\n");
		else printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
